title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-3.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 57-3.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to set forth standards for
approval and the approval process for providers of coursework or training in
the needs of students with autism that is offered to candidates for a teachers'
certificate or license in any of the following classroom teaching titles: students with disabilities in early childhood, childhood, middle childhood, adolescence, or all grades; speech and language disabilities; deaf and hard of
hearing; and blind and visually impaired and for school administrators, to the
extent required by section
3004
of the

Education Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
57-3.1

Amended

New

York State Register September 28, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 39, eff. 9/28/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
